My craptop suck nuts and cant run cs source properly, and 1.6 is filled with veterans and hackers, so condition zero is the sweet spot for me. I fire it up from time to time to play offline against bots. The bots are challenging and fun in higher difficulty levels and you can also download custom maps. It also has an okayish singleplayer campaign but who cares about it in the end. Got it on sale, didnt regret it.
Esta bueno, que se yo.

🔥 Recomendo CS 1.6 e CS: CZ por motivos bem óbvios, mesmo os gráficos não sendo comparados ao do CS:GO dá pra dizer que ele vence em todos os outros requisitos ao meu ver, modelos de personagens que são únicos e bonitos, as armas clássicas (que foram tiradas no CS:GO né), mapas clássicos (que também foram tirados no CS:GO), os bots parecem pessoas pela colaboração em time que eles tem e diferente do CS:GO que eu joguei por um bom tempo, notei que até os bots dos CS's antigos são mais espertos e dá graça jogar com eles, é barato, leve, lindo, divertido e dá pra jogar com uma galera. 🔥

Clássico FPS

When counter strike 1.6 came out, it came out as a mod, lots of people started trying it out, now its a official game.
But if you own counter strike 1.6 why should you get this game?
Well Condition zero is counter strike source mixed with counter strike 1.6 .


+ Gameplay :
The Gameplay is improved from CS 1.6 because maps have much better graphics, and there is condition zero deleted scenes, for just some single player fun.


+ Sound :
Sound hasn't been much of a problem in counter strike, it hasn't been a problem because all the the weapons make proper shooting and reloading sounds. When you kill someone the sound you get is awesome.
When you switch teams the noise you get is absolutely realistic, and its awesome, you get the whole dying effect.


+ Graphics :
The graphics still use the half life 1 engine, but the textures, models, weapons and maps have got much better graphics.
A jogabilidade do CS-Condition Zero não tem igual.

第一次玩CS zero还是在大概2002年，耐不住无聊的寄宿生生活爬墙而出到市中心的网吧里。
本来嘛，想打打普通的CS，结果发现无良网吧老板用着无盘系统，不能装cheating death，不能进到平时在家玩cs时那几个常玩的服务器.......
无意中发现了这个游戏，还可以打打电脑，而且任务还限定一定过关条件，一个晚上把全部任务的最高难度都干了...
最近重玩这个游戏发现只能打打easy...时光飞逝人老珠黄~

Counter-Strike: condition zero jest dosyć dobrą grą. Ma wady i zalety jak każda gra, Zalety są takie: Robienie sobie skilla, taki sam jak cs 1.6 (Bo jest na silniku golden source), dosyć dobre A.I, dobra gra na noc, mamy dodatkową grę o nazwię Counter-Strike Condition Zero Deleted Scenes gdzie mamy fajną fabułe. Teraz czas na minusy: Mała populacja gra w tą grę, czasami (Mi często, nie wiem jak innym) glitchuje się system challengy i muszę restartować mapę, A.I czasami nie wie co robić jak: Strzela w ściane, po chwili ogarnia kogo ma strzelać, stoi nad bombą i nic nie robi, i po chwili terro go zabija.

Czy polecam grę? Tak polecam, ale nie w cenie 40zł.
CS1.6:HD
Awesome
经典，经常在高中机房和同学偷偷的玩

Counter-Strike 1.6: El de toda la vida, graficos algo feos comparandolo con CS:GO o CSS, pero se entiende, ya tiene 20 años.
Todavía sigue siendo jugado por bastantes personas

Counter-Strike Condition Zero: Es como el original pero con texturas mas bonitas, y trae un nuevo modo, Tour of Duty, son partidas normales con bots pero agregando pequeñas "misiones" por así decirlo, que tienes que completar para poder ganar la partida y desbloquear mas mapas y puntos para hacer que tu equipo sea mejor, a mi gusto esta versión es mejor que el 1.6, el doblaje a español de las voces de los bots no esta mal, pero se escuchan muy fuera de lugar. 

Counter-Strike Condition Zero Deleted Scenes: Este juego es distinto a los otros, ya que aquí no son las partidas normales, sino un modo campaña que está muy divertido, siendo Deleted Scenes y el Condition Zero normal los mejores para jugar cuando no tengas internet, pero tiene algunos problemas, el Doblaje a español esta raro, en ocasiones el juego presenta algunos errores que no dejan avanzar en la partida, teniendo que reiniciar esa partida desde el inicio, y aveces me crashea (Aunque eso ultimo debe ser por mi PC xd) 

El único problema que comparten los 3 juegos y todos con el motor goldsource, es que no deja cambiarle el modo de gráficos a D3D (Direct3D) teniendo que jugar en Software o OpenGL, lo cual es un problema para mi, ya que tengo una PC de oficina y el OpenGL va mal y en Software se ve muy feo y presentando horrores gráficos, pero en versiones no steam si da la opción de poder jugar con D3D.
es lo único por lo que no juego mucho a estas versiones

This is the ideal Counter-Strike game. You may not like it but this is what peak counter terrorism looks like.

In all honesty, Condition Zero is actually my favorite CS. Millenials would probably say either 1.6 or Source is their favorite and zoomers would say it's CS:GO. So why the fuck am I saying it's Condition Zero for me? Well I always liked to play with bots because I was, and most definitely still am too shit for PvP, but 1.6 didn't have them integrated and my old ass PC from eons ago could not run CS:S. That's not a joke, I did not have the RAM nor GPU to actually be capable of running Source games, so my best option was to play CZ. The CT bots I enlisted to my team along the way in my many Tours of Duty were my compatriots. Gus, Kenny, Kent, Travis, Maverick, Rooster, Brent. These bots with the attention span of a goldfish fought by my side through many battles across the world against those terrorists always up to no good, planting bombs and taking hostages.

Ok now that I'm done with the Vietnam nostalgia part is is honestly the sole reason for me loving this game, let's shit on it. 
Condition Zero's AI and the game itself can really be janky as hell. Your team bots will probably not listen to you even more than the CS:GO bots already don't, and their pathfinding can be especially scuffed at times and lead to a lot of lost battles. I have far too many tales of events like this happening in maps like Militia. On top of that there's also a few little things like bots not attempting to refuse the bomb unless you're already dead (even if there are no T's left) and them fucking up the defusal process as if they were a player constantly pressing and letting go of the button.

Despite those issues, I still can't help but love CZ above all others, it's just fun. No Just the peaceful robotic sounds of "No sir." "Uhhh negative" "Nnnnope", followed by a lot of death choking and the many "and that's how it's done", "way to be team" and  "whoo"'s of victory.

tl;dr I'm a fucking anomaly that thinks Condition Zero is the best CS game.
